long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover Your Ideal Apartment!

Gnome - Funda Map Enhancer is a Chrome extension that adds more information to the funda.nl website.

Navigate to Search -> Map (Zoek -> Kaart) and discover additional features such as a Noise Map and information about Planned Constructions in Amsterdam.

Features:

- Amsterdam Noise map
- Upcoming and ongoing constructions 
- WOZ Value on property page

Tailor the displayed information using the Gnome filter panel!
